body_content.explanation: a science fiction film, TV show, book, etc. (= one about an imagined future, especially about space travel or other planets) that deals with similar subjects to those in westerns (= stories about life in the west of the United States in the past):
examples: In this space western a band of space mercenaries is drawn into a government conspiracy.
This space western has the usual cast of characters: the captain (read: sheriff) and crew (read: deputies), a doctor, a minister, and a barkeeper.
